Name: Drei Chansons für Mascha
Notes: An ironic, satirical contribution to the topic of women and music according to what von Bülow, Brahms and Strauss said.
Long Description: Die Kultivierte, Die Tüchtige, Der Liebens- würdige für S und Klav. An ironic, satirical contribution to the topic of women and music according to what von Bülow, Brahms and Strauss said.
Short Description: An ironic, satirical contribution to the topic of women and music according to what von Bülow, Brahms and Strauss said.
